title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: This RFC outlines the detailed requirements for the VoiceActivatedAdBlocker project. The document will encompass desired features (such as ad filtering, cross-device synchronization, voice command functionality), supported platforms (mobile, desktop, and smart speakers), integration with existing ad-blocking technologies (Adblock Plus, uBlock Origin), user experience considerations (ease of use, minimal impact on performance), data privacy and security requirements (compliance with GDPR, secure storage and transmission of user data), scalability and performance goals (handling high volumes of ads and voice commands), voice command recognition and processing (supporting multiple languages, accurate recognition in noisy environments), AI-powered ad detection and filtering mechanisms (using machine learning to adapt to new ad formats and strategies for bypassing ad-blockers), testing strategies (unit testing, integration testing, user acceptance testing), deployment plans (staging environment, gradual rollout to users), maintenance procedures (regular updates, bug fixes), update strategies (semantic versioning), and any other relevant technical and non-technical aspects. The document will also outline strategies for integrating with existing AI technologies (TensorFlow, OpenCV) and ensuring compliance with advertising industry standards (IAB, Coalition for Better Ads). However, it would be beneficial to break down the project into smaller tasks and assign them to specific team members (task-decomposer). The RFC will also address user onboarding, offboarding, and account management, as well as monetization strategies and business models. It is important to consider the need for multi-language support in the user interface and documentation (technical-writer), as well as accessibility for users with disabilities. Lastly, it will outline the project timeline and milestones, as well as resource allocation and team roles.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the voice recognition component, ad-blocking logic, and integration with various platforms and devices.

title: Develop Voice Recognition Module
description: Implement the voice recognition module that can accurately interpret user commands for ad-blocking.

title: Implement Ad-Blocking Logic
description: Develop the core ad-blocking logic that can selectively filter out unwanted ads based on user preferences and voice commands.

title: Integrate with Platforms and Devices
description: Develop the necessary integrations to enable the ad-blocking system to work seamlessly across various platforms and devices.

title: Implement User Interface and Voice Command System
description: Design and develop the user interface and voice command system for the ad-blocking application.

title: Set up Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Establish a comprehensive testing and quality assurance process to ensure the ad-blocking system functions correctly and meets the defined requirements.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Develop and implement security measures to protect user privacy and prevent potential vulnerabilities or misuse of the ad-blocking system.

title: Deploy and Maintain the System
description: Set up the necessary infrastructure and processes for deploying and maintaining the ad-blocking system across various platforms and devices.

title: Create User Documentation and Support Resources
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation, tutorials, and support resources to assist users in effectively utilizing the ad-blocking system.
dependencies: Implement User Interface and Voice Command System
